Lake Rotoiti, Murchison Co., Nelson.  By the outlet of the Buller River. In a marshy spot forming a mat with Sciizolema 6081. A.  Small leaved prostrate plants in the sward of flooded pans,  B.  larger plants in fruit in taller vegetation at the margin
